General.Name: Huaming Power Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd provides tap changer products in China. It offers conventional, vacuum, dry, and gas insulated type on-load tap changers; and cage and drum type de-energized (off-circuit) tap changers for transformers. The company also provides accessories, such as motor drive units, controllers, and online oil filters. Its products are primarily used in power grids and energy sector, chemical, metallurgical and railway projects, etc. industries. In addition, the company offers training and after-sales services. It also exports its products to approximately 80 countries in the United States, rest of Asia, Europe, Africa, and Oceania. The company was formerly known as Shandong FIN CNC Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd in July 2016. Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 is based in Shanghai, China.
